goal: Explain the rules of Project Nebula in simple words
steps:
Project Nebula has some important rules to follow:

1. We write our code in a special language called ZYTHON-X.
2. All ZYTHON-X files end with the .zx extension.
3. Whenever we write 120 lines of code, we need to have a code review done.
4. To fix any bugs in our code, we use a tool called NebulaScope.
5. We are only allowed to deploy (make our code live) on Fridays, and it must be between 6 PM and 8 PM.
